info.title: Rabbitmq Http API
info.description: This is the OpenAPI specification of the RabbitMQ HTTP API. For more information, please refer to [HTTP API](https://cdn.rawgit.com/rabbitmq/rabbitmq-management/v3.7.14/priv/www/api/index.html) official documentation.

exchange_types.description: AMQP headers exchange, as per the AMQP specification
exchange_types.name: headers

basic_auth.description: Basic authentication as per RabbitMQ HTTP API requirements.
